meta.name: description
meta.content: Discover The Cribs's Ignore The Ignorant in Zune Social. See related artists and albums in Mixview, as well as track listings, reviews, top listeners, and play counts. Share your own knowledge and write a review, send Ignore The Ignorant to a friend, or buy it for your collection.
